DOC.brief_summary: The influence different food componente zinc absorption young adult consume zinc fortify porridge 's prepared maize , bean sorghum : series six similar randomize , single-blind study .
DOC.brief_title: The Influence Different Food Componente Zinc Absorption Young Adults Consuming Zinc Fortified Porridges Prepared From Maize , Beans Sorghum : Series Six Similar Randomized , Single-blind Studies
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : 1 . Male female 18 45 year old 2 . Body Mass Index range 19 25 3 . No mineral vitamin supplement two week prior study whole duration study Exclusion criterion : 1 . Any metabolic , gastrointestinal chronic disease ( accord subject statement ) 2 . Longterm medication whole study ( except contraceptive ) 3 . Smoking 4 . Pregnancy 5 . Lactating 6 . Earlier participation clinical study within last 30 day Subject Withdrawal : Incomplete consumption test meal Missing test meal Missing iv dose Incomplete urine collection ( study 26 ) ; exception discuss study 1 No blood sample start study Consumption food within 3 hour iv dose evaluate Vomiting within 3 hour test meal administration evaluate Sick subject subject take medication study evaluate ( postponement test meal possible )
